prereq.p:
Some Bouncy Castle libraries must be provided in [CHEMISTRY_INSTALL_DIR]/lib to use this feature:
bcpkix-jdk18on
bcprov-jdk18on
bcutil-jdk18on

step.cmd: Create a keystore file (if you do not already have one issued):

info.codeblock: openssl req -new -newkey rsa:4096 -nodes -keyout my.key -out my.csr openssl x509 -req -sha256 -days 365 -in my.csr -signkey my.key -out my.pem cat my.key my.pem > my2.pem openssl pkcs12 -export -in my2.pem -out mykeystore.pkcs12 -name myAlias

step.cmd: Set the keystore from the command line using the -keystore-file parameter. This file alone is enough to sign a PDF.
